name: Chromatic Cardinality
description:
Chromatic Cardinality is all about the color you are based on the direction you move!
Avoid the obstacles and enemies in each room by going through them when you're the same color! Enemies can see when you get too close, but only if you're not their color! Navigate through each room to get all of the items. 

Find the hidden room and unlock it's secret power. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move around

Mouse to navigate menus.

A game made using open Frameworks in C++ using visual studio. 

Source code also available!
